actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
    "amount",
    "paymentForId",
    COUNT("paymentForId") 
FROM 
    public."Payment" 
WHERE 
    "paymentForId" = '4181' 
    AND ("createdAt" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Kolkata') 
        BETWEEN '2025-02-15' AND '2025-02-25' and 
				"status" = 'responseReceivedSuccess'
GROUP BY 
    "amount", 
    "paymentForId";
